short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you change and find password easier, which you can remember later on. And even if you forget it just find it here :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension can create a password, which you can easily remember, check existing passwords and save your passwords encrypted so you can find them if you should have forgotten.
